 "He knows. But like I said..he loves you. And why could you not return the 
feelings. You never know till you try. Just put a little faith. Trust your 
spark..and make sure you leave not regrets. I know that you will find the 
truth thier." he pondred why should could nopt figure this out. He saw in her 
eyes she cared for him. But he did not know if he imagined it or if she was 
just plain afraid. And that would be a shame
